TextLibrary.Text: I just received a message from the MRI. They want me to return to Serpens Prime.
I just received a message from the MRI. They want me to return to Serpens Prime.
I have a bad feeling about this. I told them to meet me at Vega Station.
I have a bad feeling about this. I told them to meet me at Vega Station.
I think they know we have Beta Prime. They'll try to capture her. If we meet them in the Vega System, I think we can get away.
I think they know we have Beta Prime. They'll try to capture her. If we meet them in the Vega System, I think we can get away.
